pr_title: Fix annotation anchors and errors being classified as Types

timeline.message: Fix errors being added to Types

timeline.bodyText: Is there a possibility to add a unit test for this?
timeline.author: pramodya1994

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/java/org/ballerinalang/test/documentation/ErrorsTest.java b/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/java/org/ballerinalang/test/documentation/ErrorsTest.java
